Get Test Drug Concepts

Source: R/x_get_test.R
get_test_drug_concepts.Rd

Get random records of RxNorm and RxNorm Extension Concepts that are:

  1. Valid,

  2. Not a Class,

  3. Belong to the Drug domain

Get random records of ATC and HemOnc Drug Classes that are:

  1. Valid,

  2. Class,

  3. Belong to the Drug domain

get_test_drug_concepts(
  conn,
  conn_fun = "connectAthena()",
  schema = "omop_vocabulary",
  limit = 100,
  verbose = TRUE,
  render_sql = TRUE
)

get_test_drug_classes(
  conn,
  conn_fun = "connectAthena()",
  schema = "omop_vocabulary",
  limit = 100,
  verbose = TRUE,
  render_sql = TRUE
)

See also

parse_expr render

parse_expr render

Examples

library(chariot)
library(tidyverse)

# Get Unfiltered Test Concepts (Invalid Concepts are included)
get_test_concepts()

# Concepts specific to the Drug domain can be sampled
# RxNorm/RxNorm Extension Concepts
